MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.34pm. Our engineers have on site at the Dovecoat substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.12pm on Saturday 23rd January 2021.
